channel.title: CVE Feed for Panasonic Holdings Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Panasonic Holdings Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7013|2024-08-21T13:31:43.197Z -- panasonic%20holdings%20corporation -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Control FPWIN Pro version 7.7.2.0 and all previous versions may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted project file.

item.title: CVE-2024-4162|2024-08-01T20:33:52.545Z -- panasonic%20holdings%20corporation -- kw%20watcher
item.description: A buffer error in Panasonic KW Watcher versions 1.00 through 2.83 may allow attackers malicious read access to memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-4162|2024-06-04T17:55:39.613Z -- panasonic%20holdings%20corporation -- kw%20watcher
item.description: A buffer error in Panasonic KW Watcher versions 1.00 through 2.83 may allow attackers malicious read access to memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-7013|2024-08-21T05:56:06.650Z -- panasonic%20holdings%20corporation -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Control FPWIN Pro version 7.7.2.0 and all previous versions may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted project file.
